title: Homeopath & Crystal Reiki Healing - Cardiff
description: Homeopath & Crystal Reiki Healing in Cardiff. Homeopathic Consultant, Reiki Master and Crystal Healer, specialising in women's health, including stress, anxiety and depression, Lydia offers a warm, relaxing and comforting atmosphere, where you can feel welcomed and safe. Lydia uses gentle, effective, homeopathic medicines with no nasty side-effects which are safe for pregnant women and children. Reiki and Crystal healing sessions available alone or as a combined treatment with homeopathic consultation and medicine. Lydia is registered with the Society of Homeopaths and the Complementary Medical Association, so you can feel safe in the knowledge that you will be receiving the highest professional standards and care.
